email.subject: Scheduled Report
email.body_template:
Dear $!firstName,

Your scheduled$!reportTitle is ready for viewing.

If the above link does not work, log onto the voting site and paste http://www.usvotefoundation.org/vote/reportingdashboard/ViewReport.htm?reportId=$!reportId&startDate=$!startDate&endDate=$!endDate into your browser.

Contact us at anytime with questions and comments
©2012-$!year US Vote Foundation. All Rights Reserved.
